title: Industrial IoT Supervision System
short: IoT-based system for real-time industrial supervision.
solution: Developed IoT system with ESP32, Node-RED, InfluxDB and Grafana dashboards.
result: 20% reduction in downtime and improved reliability.
problem_long: Machines were facing frequent stoppages with no real-time monitoring or predictive insights. Operators had limited visibility on performance.
solution_long: Engineered a low-cost IoT supervision system using ESP32 gateways, Node-RED, InfluxDB, Grafana and MQTT. Delivered interactive dashboards with OEE KPIs and alerts.
result_long: Achieved a 20% reduction in downtime, enhanced quality control, and improved operator safety. ROI realized quickly through reduced non-conformities.

title: O-Ring Inspection Machine
short: Automated machine for O-ring presence detection.
problem: Manual O-ring inspection was unreliable and error-prone.
solution: Designed and simulated a SolidWorks machine for automated detection of missing or misaligned O-rings.
result: Zero defective parts shipped, human error eliminated.
problem_long: O-rings were manually checked, leading to missed defects and increased customer complaints.
solution_long: Developed an automated O-ring inspection machine in SolidWorks. Included functional 3D animation for validation.
result_long: Eliminated customer defects, improved quality assurance and reduced rework costs.

title: Plastic Lid Curing Line
short: Customized curing line for plastic lids.
problem: Existing oven was not adapted to client requirements.
solution: Designed and built a thermal and mechanical adaptation in SolidWorks, validated onsite.
result: 15% productivity gain and improved lid quality.
problem_long: The client's curing oven was unsuitable for specific plastic lid requirements, leading to defects and wasted cycles.
solution_long: Performed feasibility study, redesigned the oven and line using SolidWorks, and supervised installation at client site.
result_long: Delivered a 15% increase in throughput, improved lid consistency and reduced energy waste.

title: Spare Parts Store Layout
short: 3D optimized layout for spare parts warehouse.
problem: Storage space was poorly organized and underutilized.
solution: Modeled the warehouse in 3D and optimized functional zones for flow and ergonomics.
problem_long: The warehouse suffered from poor layout, leading to wasted space and inefficient operator movement.
solution_long: Redesigned the warehouse with 3D functional zoning and circulation paths. Delivered realistic renders for approval.
result_long: Achieved a 20% gain in space, better ergonomics and smoother logistics management.

title: Compressor Room Simulation
problem: Lack of visualization before installation caused errors.
solution: Created a 3D simulation of the compressor room with piping and equipment integration.
result: Prevented layout errors and improved planning.
problem_long: The client had no visualization of compressor installations, leading to costly mistakes.
solution_long: Simulated the entire compressor room in SketchUp/AutoCAD, integrating equipment and piping networks.
result_long: Facilitated planning, improved accuracy, and avoided misplacement errors.

title: Plastic Welding Test Machine
short: Hydraulic machine for plastic weld testing.
solution: Designed hydraulic test machine in SolidWorks to measure weld strength in Newtons.
result: 25% reduction in scrap and full traceability.
problem_long: Plastic welds in automotive filters were not reliably tested, leading to undetected weak welds.
solution_long: Conceived and dimensioned a hydraulic testing machine in SolidWorks. Integrated force measurement for traceability.
result_long: Achieved 100% traceability, reduced scrap by 25%, and ensured compliance with client requirements.

title: Plastic Lid Fixation System
short: Custom fixture for plastic lid fixation.
problem: Fixation of lids on machine jigs was difficult and imprecise.
solution: Developed ergonomic and robust fixture designed in SolidWorks, tested and validated.
result: Safer, faster and more precise assembly.
problem_long: Operators struggled to attach lids to machine jigs, reducing safety and efficiency.
solution_long: Researched alternatives and created a 3D-printed prototype fixture in SolidWorks. Supervised testing and validation.
result_long: Delivered an ergonomic solution that improved safety, reduced cycle time and increased precision.

title: Sliding Door System
short: Custom sliding door system to optimize space.
problem: Hinged doors wasted space and blocked circulation.
solution: Designed and installed sliding door system in SolidWorks with supervised fabrication.
result: Freed 30% of usable space and improved ergonomics.
problem_long: The clientâ€™s workshop faced severe space constraints due to hinged doors obstructing circulation.
solution_long: Conducted feasibility study, then designed and implemented a sliding door system in SolidWorks. Supervised fabrication and installation.
result_long: Achieved 30% more usable space, improved safety and increased operator productivity.

title: Oil Filter Decomposition Machine
short: Machine for safe and fast decomposition of oil filters.
problem: Manual disassembly was unsafe, slow and inconsistent.
solution: Designed a dedicated decomposition machine in SolidWorks with functional animation.
result: Reduced processing time and improved operator safety.
problem_long: Metallic oil filters were decomposed manually with hand tools, leading to slow processes and operator safety risks.
solution_long: Developed a custom decomposition machine in SolidWorks. Integrated robust mechanisms and validated with functional animation.
result_long: Achieved 50% faster decomposition, increased operator safety, and ensured repeatable reliable process.
